name: 2D Shooter: Event Horizon
description:
This is my 2D Space Shooter (Event Horizon) project. 

Modifications include:

  1. Enemy placements/layouts differ in each level
  2. Information about the game is added in the Menu options
  3. Updated UI to display high score and scores
  4. An extra level has been added to test the player skills
  5. Varying difficulties as the player progresses:
    1. Enemy attributes have been altered
    2. Enemy spawners have been inserted in the final level

Credits:

Created by Kerde Regis
